text: Willem van der Steen (9 November 1905 - 10 March 1983) was a Dutch long- distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1905 births Category:1983 deaths Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Dutch male long- distance runners Category:Dutch male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of the Netherlands Category:Sportspeople from Amsterdam
title: Willem van der Steen
